page.title: 07A NEWSPAPER IN CROSSGATES
page.content: The{Leeds Skyrack Express}was started about 100 years ago. The paper comes out{weekly.}They print about 55,000 papers a week. There is only one office in Crossgates where all the information is collected.The paper is made up of approximately 70% {advertisements,}20%{local news}and 10% {photographs.}The newspaper covers local events such as sporting activities, weddings, garden fetes and issues that effect our area. One of these is transport problems, for example the condition of our roads and the amount of traffic using them. It also covers social concerns such as street hygiene and vandalism. The paper is of great value to our local community, as it is free, and keeps us informed of the things going on in Crossgates. The newspaper shows local media at work.
